title: 新玩家会被分配到游客的权限组里。求解
author: IM绅士
txt_content:
我改了下配置，玩家就被分配到游客了！
配置如下：
groups:
  VIP3:
    default: true
    permissions: []
    inheritance: []
    info:
      prefix: ''
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      prefix: '&e'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  VIP4:
    default: true
    permissions: []
    inheritance: []
    info:
      prefix: ''
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -vanish.*
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      prefix: '&4'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  VIP1:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -essentials.chat.color
    - -essentials.msg.color
    - -essentials.hat
    - -essentials.nick
    - -essentials.pt
    - automessage.receive.GG
    - chestcommands.open.VIP服务中心.yml
    - chestcommands.open.主菜单.yml
    - chestcommands.open.商城界面.yml
    - chestcommands.open.子菜单领地.yml
    - chestcommands.open.服务器电台.yml
    - chestcommands.open.游戏币购买.yml
    - chestcommands.open.点卷商城.yml
    - chestcommands.open.超值礼包.yml
    - EasyKits.kits.cd
    - EasyKits.kits.cooldown
    - EasyKits.kits.maxuse
    - EasyKits.kits.sw
    - EasyKits.kits.xs
    - PlayerPoints.lead
    - PlayerPoints.look
    - PlayerPoints.me
    - plotme.add
    - plotme.limit.1
    - plotme.remove
    - plotme.use
    - serversigns.admin
    - shop.buy
    - shop.sell
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&f&l'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  VIP2:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance: []
    info:
      prefix: ''
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -essentials.chat.color
    - -essentials.msg.color
    - -essentials.hat
    - -essentials.nick
    - -essentials.pt
    - automessage.receive.GG
    - chestcommands.open.VIP服务中心.yml
    - chestcommands.open.主菜单.yml
    - chestcommands.open.商城界面.yml
    - chestcommands.open.子菜单领地.yml
    - chestcommands.open.服务器电台.yml
    - chestcommands.open.游戏币购买.yml
    - chestcommands.open.点卷商城.yml
    - chestcommands.open.超值礼包.yml
    - EasyKits.kits.cd
    - EasyKits.kits.cooldown
    - EasyKits.kits.maxuse
    - EasyKits.kits.sw
    - EasyKits.kits.xs
    - PlayerPoints.lead
    - PlayerPoints.look
    - PlayerPoints.me
    - plotme.add
    - plotme.limit.1
    - plotme.remove
    - plotme.use
    - serversigns.admin
    - shop.buy
    - shop.sell
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&f&l'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      prefix: '&5'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin

      prefix: '&c'

      suffix: ''

    inheritance: []

replies.author: Tommer
replies.txt_content:
default 是默认
只把builder 开 default就可以了

replies.author: wei_shao
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: IM绅士
replies.txt_content:
wei_shao 发表于 2016-5-11 13:33
groups:
  VIP3:
    default: true
现在连登陆都不好使了 你能教教我怎么让VIP组继承builder权限组吗

replies.author: SkyCatcher
replies.txt_content:
你每个组下面都有个
default: true复制代码
这个代表玩家第一次进入默认归入哪个组。请把你想要让玩家默认的组写为true，其他组下面这一项全改为false

replies.author: wei_shao
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: IM绅士
replies.txt_content:
wei_shao 发表于 2016-5-11 16:40
/mangaddi xxx yyy ＝ 让用户组xxx继承yyy的权限
继承不了的

b62295521 发表于 2016-5-12 09:40
